title: Talking Flower

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Loudmouth**: Publically announce the role of a player, they will be untargetable by non-koopas on the next day and night.
- **Gossip** (1x): Announce a player as any role you want, it will appear as a **Loudmouth** reveal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start knowing the roles of 3 players, 2 townies and 1 neutral if possible.

desc:
Post 4310
*"I wonder what Goombas taste like..."*
